newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria places 1.04 bln levs 7-day T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria places 1.04 bln levs 7-day T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry placed 1.04 billion lev worth of seven-day discount T-bills, yielding 3.67 percent to maturity, the Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) said on Friday.
In line with its usual practice the BNB did not say with which financial instituion or institutions the issue was placed on Thursday.
Details of the issue follow. Priced percent of par.
